languages.text: "Кстати... Кое-что о вчерашнем вечере я все же помню. Вы, шерин, интересовались, какие подарки принято дарить девушкам на Ифрите перед тем, как звать их на свидание. Но ответ уже не услышали — ветра сна вас унесли. Так вот, оружие, драгоценности и верность — вот что дарят девам на моем мире". {n}Игриво подмигнув на прощание, Джай дарит вам ослепительную улыбку.{/n}

"By the way... There is one thing I remember about yesterday. You, shereen, wanted to know what kinds of gifts it is customary to give to girls on Efreet. You never heard the answer — the wind of sleep had already whisked you away. But weapons, valuables, and loyalty — that's what girls are given on my world." {n}Winking playfully in farewell, Jae gives you a dazzling smile.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Кстати... Кое-что о вчерашнем вечере я все же помню. Вы, шерин, интересовались, какие подарки принято дарить девушкам на Ифрите перед тем, как звать их на свидание. Но ответ уже не услышали — ветра сна вас унесли. Так вот, оружие, драгоценности и верность — вот что дарят девам на моем мире". {n}Игриво подмигнув на прощание, Джай дарит вам ослепительную улыбку.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "By the way... There is one thing I remember about yesterday, You, shereen, wanted to know what kinds of gifts it is customary to give to girls on Efreet before asking them out on a date. You never heard the answer — the wind of sleep had already whisked you away. But weapons, valuables, and loyalty — that's what girls are given on my world." {n}Winking playfully in farewell, Jae gives you a dazzling smile.{/n}
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

There is one thing I remember about yesterday, You, shereen, wanted to know what kinds of gifts it is customary to give to girls on Efreet before asking them out on a date. You never heard the answer — the wind of sleep had already whisked you away. But weapons, valuables, and loyalty — that's what girls are given on my world." {n}Winking playfully in farewell, Jae gives you a dazzling smile.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "By the way... There is one thing I remember about yesterday. You, shereen, wanted to know what kinds of gifts it is customary to give to girls on Efreet. You never heard the answer — the wind of sleep had already whisked you away. But weapons, valuables, and loyalty — that's what girls are given on my world." {n}Winking playfully in farewell, Jae gives you a dazzling smile.{/n}
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: “对了……我还记得昨天发生了一件事情，亲爱的。你当时问我，艾弗里特的女孩子通常都喜欢什么样的礼物。当时你没能听到答案，因为你已经昏昏欲睡了。不过我现在可以告诉你，在我的故乡，女孩子们会受到这样的礼物——武器、财宝，还有忠诚。”{n}婕伊俏皮地眨了眨眼，向你告别，对你露出了灿烂的笑容。{/n}
languages.original_text: "By the way... There is one thing I remember about yesterday. You, shereen, wanted to know what kinds of gifts it is customary to give to girls on Efreet. You never heard the answer — the wind of sleep had already whisked you away. But weapons, valuables, and loyalty — that's what girls are given on my world." {n}Winking playfully in farewell, Jae gives you a dazzling smile.{/n}

traits.locale_text: “对了……我还记得昨天发生了一件事情，亲爱的。你当时问我，如果是在艾弗里特，在约女孩子出去之前，通常要送给她什么样的礼物。当时你没能听到答案，因为你已经昏昏欲睡了。不过我现在可以告诉你，在我的故乡，女孩子们会受到这样的礼物——武器、财宝，还有忠诚。”{n}婕伊俏皮地眨了眨眼，向你告别，对你露出了灿烂的笑容。{/n}
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: 「ところで… 昨日のことでひとつ覚えていることがあるんだ、シャリーン。イフリートでは、どんなプレゼントを贈る習慣があるのか、シャリーンは知りたがっていたでしょう？あんたはその答えを聞かなかった…眠りの風が、あんたを連れ去ってしまったから。でも、武器、貴重品、忠誠心…それがあたしの世界では女の子に贈られるものなんだ」{n}別れ際に戯れにウインクしたジェイは、まぶしい笑顔をあなたに向ける。{/n}
languages.original_text: "By the way... There is one thing I remember about yesterday. You, shereen, wanted to know what kinds of gifts it is customary to give to girls on Efreet. You never heard the answer — the wind of sleep had already whisked you away. But weapons, valuables, and loyalty — that's what girls are given on my world." {n}Winking playfully in farewell, Jae gives you a dazzling smile.{/n}

traits.locale_text: 「ところで… 昨日のことでひとつ覚えていることがあるんだ、シャリーン。イフリートでは、どんなプレゼントを贈る習慣があるのか、シャリーンは知りたがっていたでしょう？あんたはその答えを聞かなかった…眠りの風が、あんたを連れ去ってしまったから。でも、武器、貴重品、忠誠心…それがあたしの世界では女の子に贈られるものなんだ」{n}別れ際に戯れにウインクしたジェイは、まぶしい笑顔をあなたに向ける。{/n}
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: «Por cierto... hay una cosa que sí recuerdo de anoche. Shereen, me preguntó qué clase de regalos suelen recibir las chicas en Efreet. No llegó a escuchar la respuesta porque ya estaba felizmente dormid{mf|o|a}. Armas, objetos de valor y lealtad: eso es lo que las chicas reciben en mi mundo». {n}Con un guiño juguetón a modo de despedida, Jae te lanza una sonrisa deslumbrante.{/n}
languages.original_text: "By the way... There is one thing I remember about yesterday. You, shereen, wanted to know what kinds of gifts it is customary to give to girls on Efreet. You never heard the answer — the wind of sleep had already whisked you away. But weapons, valuables, and loyalty — that's what girls are given on my world." {n}Winking playfully in farewell, Jae gives you a dazzling smile.{/n}

traits.locale_text: «Por cierto... hay una cosa que sí recuerdo de anoche. Shereen, me preguntó qué clase de regalos suelen recibir las chicas en Efreet antes de una cita. No llegó a escuchar la respuesta porque ya estaba felizmente dormid{mf|o|a}. Armas, objetos de valor y lealtad: eso es lo que las chicas reciben en mi mundo».{n}Con un guiño juguetón a modo de despedida, Jae te lanza una sonrisa deslumbrante».{/n}
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: « Au fait, shereen... Je me souviens tout de même d'une chose, pour hier soir : vous vouliez savoir quel genre de cadeaux il était coutume d'offrir aux jeunes femmes d'Éfrit. La réponse n'est jamais arrivée jusqu'à vos oreilles, le sommeil s'étant déjà emparé de vous, mais les armes, les objets précieux et la loyauté... Voilà ce que les jeunes femmes reçoivent, sur mon monde. » {n}Jae s'éloigne en vous adressant un clin d'œil espiègle, accompagné d'un sourire étincelant.{/n}
languages.original_text: "By the way... There is one thing I remember about yesterday. You, shereen, wanted to know what kinds of gifts it is customary to give to girls on Efreet. You never heard the answer — the wind of sleep had already whisked you away. But weapons, valuables, and loyalty — that's what girls are given on my world." {n}Winking playfully in farewell, Jae gives you a dazzling smile.{/n}

traits.locale_text: « Au fait, shereen... Je me souviens tout de même d'une chose, pour hier soir : vous vouliez savoir quel genre de cadeaux il était coutume d'offrir aux jeunes femmes d'Éfrit avant de les inviter à un rendez-vous. La réponse n'est jamais arrivée jusqu'à vos oreilles, le sommeil s'étant déjà emparé de vous, mais les armes, les objets précieux et la loyauté... Voilà ce que les jeunes femmes reçoivent, sur mon monde. » {n}Jae s'éloigne en vous adressant un clin d'œil espiègle, accompagné d'un sourire étincelant.{/n}
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: "Übrigens ... An eine Sache von gestern erinnere ich mich. Ihr, Shereen, wolltet wissen, was für Geschenke man Mädchen auf Efreet macht. Ich konnte Euch nie antworten – der Schlaf hatte Euch bereits überkommen. Waffen, Wertgegenstände und Loyalität – das sind die Sachen, die man Mädchen auf meiner Welt schenkt." {n}Jae zwinkert dir zum Abschied spielerisch zu und schenkt dir ein strahlendes Lächeln.{/n}
languages.original_text: "By the way... There is one thing I remember about yesterday. You, shereen, wanted to know what kinds of gifts it is customary to give to girls on Efreet. You never heard the answer — the wind of sleep had already whisked you away. But weapons, valuables, and loyalty — that's what girls are given on my world." {n}Winking playfully in farewell, Jae gives you a dazzling smile.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Übrigens ... An eine Sache von gestern erinnere ich mich. Ihr, Shereen, wolltet wissen, was für Geschenke man Mädchen auf Efreet macht, bevor man sie um eine Verabredung bittet. Ich konnte Euch nie antworten – der Schlaf hatte Euch bereits überkommen. Waffen, Wertgegenstände und Loyalität – das sind die Sachen, die man Mädchen auf meiner Welt schenkt." {n}Jae zwinkert dir zum Abschied spielerisch zu und schenkt dir ein strahlendes Lächeln.{/n}
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: "Bu arada... Düne dair hatırladığım bir şey var. İfrit geleneklerine göre kızlara ne tür hediyeler verilir, onu öğrenmek istemiştin şirinim. Bunun yanıtını duyma fırsatın olmadı. Uyku rüzgârları seni o an alıp götürdü. Silahlar, değerli eşyalar ve soyluluk... Benim dünyamda kızlara bunlar verilir." {n}Jae, şakacı bir edayla göz kırpıp ışıl ışıl gülümseyerek sana veda ediyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: "By the way... There is one thing I remember about yesterday. You, shereen, wanted to know what kinds of gifts it is customary to give to girls on Efreet. You never heard the answer — the wind of sleep had already whisked you away. But weapons, valuables, and loyalty — that's what girls are given on my world." {n}Winking playfully in farewell, Jae gives you a dazzling smile.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Bu arada... Düne dair hatırladığım bir şey var. İfrit geleneklerine göre kızlara ne tip hediyeler verilir, onu öğrenmek istemiştin şirinim. Bunun yanıtını duyma fırsatın olmadı. Uyku rüzgârları seni o an alıp götürdü. Ama silahlar, değerli eşyalar ve soyluluk... Benim dünyamda kızlara bunlar verilir." {n}Jae sana, şakacı bir edayla göz kırparak ve ışıl ışıl gülümseyerek veda ediyor.{/n}
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion
